name: VIR-265.01 Verify that the following information is shown at the slot 2

userStory.narrative:
As a customer I would like to see the recommended grade level,
base model, price, width, depth, height, material description,
leg view and configure from left to right on the pdp in the second content slot

title: VIR-265.01 Verify that the following information is shown at the slot 2
description:
Examples:
|info|
|recommended grade level|
|base model|
|price|
|width|
|depth|
|height|
|material description|
|leg view|
